amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund for border security, immigration enforcement, and criminal alien removal programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4231 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 37. Record Vote Number: 60.

action.text: Amendment SA 4231 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S1955-1961; text: CR S1955-1956) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund for border security, immigration enforcement, and criminal alien removal programs.
